editorialNotes.standard: We love chilling withÂ friends in this classic card gameâs standard mode or shaking things up with wild new rules and team-based play.

Colourful chaos awaits in our 2016 iPhone Game of the Year. Supercellâs awesome card battler delivers excellent deck-building mechanics and fast-paced fights in a package thatâs easy to understand and undeniably fun. Upgrading, unlocking and experimenting with cards gives the game endless replayability, and deciding just where to drop your heroes makes each battle distinct. But no matter how good your deck is, thereâs no substitute for skill and quick thinking.
editorialNotes.short: Collect powerful cards and crush your competition.

editorialNotes.standard: Miniclipâs 8 Ball Pool delivers a clean online billiards experience that awards players for speedy turns. We found ourselves collecting rare pool cues and training to clear tables faster, with higher scores and longer combos. An alluring level-up system and the ability to bet your in-game currency on the outcome of head-to-head matches makes jumping online for a quick game as rewarding as it is intense.Â
editorialNotes.short: Finally, we can put that trigonometry to use!

editorialNotes.standard: Hipster Whale's Apple Design Awardâwinning game takes a timeless arcade formulaâcross a road bustling with traffic and deadly obstaclesâand transforms it into an adorable infinite runner. As you progress, youâll unlock new characters with wildly diverse looks and effects. Thereâs a teeny-tiny flea, an emo goose, and even a few characters from other gamesâlike Epoch, who sprays cars with blocky bullets. The creativity and care put into Crossy Roadâs wacky world are unmistakable.
